Various tools and miscellaneous commands.

## /tools patron clue_gains

**Usage**

- `/tools patron clue_gains time:<string> [tier:<string>] [ironman:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `time` | `string` | Yes | The time period. | - |
| `tier` | `string` | No | The tier of clue scroll. | - |
| `ironman` | `boolean` | No | Only check ironmen accounts. | - |

## /tools patron kc_gains

**Usage**

- `/tools patron kc_gains time:<string> monster:<string> [ironman:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `time` | `string` | Yes | The time period. | - |
| `monster` | `string` | Yes | The monster you want to pick. | - |
| `ironman` | `boolean` | No | Only check ironmen accounts. | - |

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `time` | `string` | Yes | The time period. | - |

## /tools patron drystreak

**Usage**

- `/tools patron drystreak source:<string> item:<string> [ironman:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `source` | `string` | Yes | The source of the item – a monster, minigame, clue, etc. | - |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to pick. | - |
| `ironman` | `boolean` | No | Only check ironmen accounts. | - |

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to pick. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | Filter by account type. | - |

## /tools stash_units view

**Usage**

- `/tools stash_units view [unit:<string>] [not_filled:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `unit` | `string` | No | The specific unit you want to view (optional). | - |
| `not_filled` | `boolean` | No | View all STASH units that you have not filled/built. | - |
